title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The checked state of the table takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) to update. There is no indication of any action happening during this update process.
EB: The checked state of the table should update quickly, ideally within a few seconds. Additionally, a busy cursor should be displayed during the update process to indicate that the system is working on the task.
SR:
1. Improve the performance of updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature so that changes are reflected more quickly.
2. Implement a busy cursor to be shown during the update process of the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature.
